name: Legion
description:
Crafted from a slick, high-shine weave, the Legion was conceived by 987 and famed Terran underground designer, Jieto, to shock the status quo of hooded jackets and usher in a new era of aesthetic functionality.  
Women's sizes currently out of stock.
description_cn:
用华丽的高反光编制材料制作而成的军团夹克是由987服装的著名泰拉地下设计师吉托设计的. 当初设计这款夹克的理念便是想用这种全新世代的美学来冲击当下陈旧的夹克设计行业.  
女款目前缺货.

shop_buy.layout_name_cn: 斯坦顿(Stanton)-十字军(Crusader)-耶拉(Yela)-六角湾(Grim HEX)-KCTrending
